name: safeline
description: SafeLine is a self-hosted security platform that detects web application attacks using AI. It includes dashboards, threat intelligence, and supports scalable deployment.
features: AI-powered detection: Uses machine learning to identify web application attacks and zero-day threats.
Web application firewall: Protects against OWASP Top 10 vulnerabilities including SQL injection and XSS.
Real-time monitoring: Displays live traffic analysis and threat detection in comprehensive dashboards.
Threat intelligence: Integrates global threat feeds to block known malicious IPs and attack patterns.
Custom rules: Create and deploy custom security rules tailored to your application's needs.
Attack visualization: Provides detailed attack timelines and geographic distribution maps.
API protection: Secures REST and GraphQL APIs with rate limiting and input validation.
SSL/TLS termination: Handles HTTPS traffic with automatic certificate management.
Logging and alerts: Sends notifications via email, Slack, or webhooks for security events.
Performance optimization: Minimal latency impact with efficient request processing and caching.
Compliance reporting: Generates audit logs and reports for security compliance requirements.
Multi-site support: Protects multiple domains and applications from a single deployment.
